Erase all of your personal information and any downloaded applications? It is impossible to reverse this action!

Your phone and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by applications from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your phone or loss of data that may result from using these applications.

All of this application\'s data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, settings, accounts, databases and so on.

Debug mode when USB is connected

USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. It can be used to copy data between your computer and your device, install applications on your device without notification, and read log data.

This accessibility service may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data credit card numbers except passwords. It may also log your user interface interactions. It comes from the application %1$s. Use this accessibility service?

Changes will come into effect on the next time power saving mode is activated
Notification will be shown when the battery is running low. Click on the notification to enter power settings.
Screen brightness will be set to minimum. Can drastically decrease power draw.
Reduces power draw and data charges.
Disable syncing of contacts, mail, etc.
Disable mobile networks such as GPRS and 3G.
Vibrations do not consume much power under normal usage.
Live Wallpapers are significant source of power draw and may cause system lag.
Reduces screen timeout interval to minimum. May help with battery life.

Want to extend your battery life?
1.Limit number of background applications. \n2.Unless under bright light, there is no need for maximum brightness. \n3.Consider activating Airplane Mode at night.
